projects.name: Autonomous Car Parking System
projects.summary: Developed a reinforcement learning-based self-driving car simulation integrated with a real-world Arduino vehicle via REST APIs.
highlights: Built and trained an RL agent for autonomous parking in Unity.
Integrated simulation control with hardware deployment.
Awarded 3rd Runner-Up among 100+ teams at UIU Project Show (Summer 2024).

projects.name: OptiTask - Personal Management System
projects.summary: Developed an AI-driven task management platform with emotion-aware chatbot support, smart task automation, and real-time collaboration.
highlights: Integrated Gemini API with Stanford NLP for emotion-based chatbot interaction.
Implemented real-time collaboration using React, Node.js, and Socket.io.
Won 1st Place (Poster Category) among 150+ teams at UIU Fall Project Show 2024.

projects.name: VoteChain - Blockchain Based Voting System
projects.summary: Building a decentralized voting system using smart contracts for secure and transparent elections.
highlights: Implemented real-time vote validation with Solidity and custom APIs.
Used React, Next.js, TypeScript, and Web3.js for frontend and blockchain integration.

projects.name: EngReji - AI Powered Learning Platform
projects.summary: Created an AI platform enabling rural Bangladeshi students to improve spoken English via real-time speech analysis and feedback.
highlights: Built scalable Python backend with speech analysis using open-source AI models.
Designed frontend with TypeScript and Tailwind CSS.
Recognized as Finalist (AI Category) at Bangladesh Blockchain Olympiad 2025.
Received Honorable Mention and shortlisted at JavaAIFest (TheraBD).
